name: Tuna The Cat
description: Tuna The Cat is a colorful 2.5D side scroller with a retro play style. On a mission to recover his stolen tacos, you will help Tuna through 20 stages and 5 boss battles. Try to collect all the missing tacos for extra lives, trust me you will need them. In Tuna The Cat patience is key, with well timed jumps and slides you will have loads of fun helping Tuna.
